title: Closed, found one.  WTB: Low grade PSA Mordecai Brown Chicago on shirt
author: tsp06

posts.post_title: Closed, found one.  WTB: Low grade PSA Mordecai Brown Chicago on shirt
posts.post_content:
Hi.  I'm looking for a low grade PSA Mordecai Chicago on shirt.  Cubs on shirt is fine too.  I would like a number grade and not altered (authentic).  I'm still kicking myself for not buying the one that was on here recently.  :)

Please PM if you have one you would like to sell.

Thanks!
**Edited to add Cubs on shirt in addition to Chicago on shirt.**
Still looking. Will consider raw as well if untrimmed and intact. Creases are fine.  Thanks!
